website_summaries.verdict: The Sony MP-CD1 Mobile Projector is a stylish, phone-size mini-projector with a built-in battery. It delivers good overall image quality at a somewhat steep price.

customer_reviews.title: You can't watch movies with it
customer_reviews.text: First, you should know that it's not 1920x720. I tried to output a pixel grid to it, and it's definitely not 1920x720. I didn't expect that Sony lies in the specification. When using miracast, neither video nor audio plays smoothly. It doesn't work either. My requirements for color quality are very low. However, the colors are just awful. It's really not possible to watch movies. Probably it's possible to do PowerPoint with it. But if you are looking for a portable solution for movies, I promise, it's not for you.
customer_reviews.author: Victor Yudin

customer_reviews.title: Weird shimmery image
customer_reviews.text: Definitely doesn't look like 1920x720p resolution... My 720p LG projector looks better. The image has a weird shimmery effect that makes text unreadable and blurry. I think this is called speckle, which I had never heard of before. Too hard to return since I'm out of the country, but I do not recommend this projector. The positives: great size, very portable, but I wouldn't pay over $150 - $200 if I knew the image quality before purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Ben LeClair

customer_reviews.title: A must for those who like being outdoors and still watch TV
customer_reviews.text: I like being outdoors and like watching sports, this is a must. Picture is clear and crisp. You can go bigger picture size the farther away you put it but the quality does go down. Tried both Android and IPhone on it, highly recommend it for Android because Iphones limit what you can view on it. I use my old Samsung and can view Amazon prime movies, HBO Go, and other streaming apps. Love that you can connect a speaker via Bluetooth for bigger sound. Recommend for those who like being outdoors. *Picture included is me using my truck door as a screen
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice, compact projector
customer_reviews.text: REALLY compact! Provides a good picture for presentations, as long as the room is pretty dark. A small blue-tooth or wired speaker is a real asset if you like to hear decent sound with your video...
customer_reviews.author: John Huddleson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size with a great picture in low light
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Portable! Same size as my pixel XL 2. Comes with lense protector/adjustable stand. Great picture with no ambient light. Battery life will last for a 2 1/2 hour long movie. Easy to adjust projected screen angles. Cons: You need a speaker or head phones if you want to hear your movie. You need a very low lit place or the picture is difficult to see.
customer_reviews.author: kris kom

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: excellent and portable projector! i can project using the whole wall! arrived early than i expected.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sleek design and looks well made but horrible on brightness
customer_reviews.text: Sleek design and looks well made but horrible on brightness. You almost have to be in total darkness to see anything. Ok for watching movies and stuff on the go but definitely not for presentations
customer_reviews.author: CHIRLA

customer_reviews.title: Know your need
customer_reviews.text: Only complaint is light intensity. You'd expect that of course with a small unit but more than I anticipated. Solid Sony product.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher D.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like it but I should have more shine lumens sony should not fail in that
customer_reviews.author: GERARDO

customer_reviews.title: easy to use
customer_reviews.text: ready to use, easy to use. good definition on not so large images.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica Sainz de Rapuano

customer_reviews.title: Great concept but not very bright
customer_reviews.text: The project is awesome in theory, but as other reviews cautioned, it’s not very bright. If it was brighter I would have definitely kept the item!
customer_reviews.author: Robert P

customer_reviews.title: Small, thin and a great picture.
customer_reviews.text: This little projector can fit in a shirt pocket. Work wirelessly or be connected. Average battery life is a little over 2 hours with a sharp, no focusing clear picture.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Frantz

customer_reviews.title: More brightness would be a huge plus
customer_reviews.text: Eventho the brightness is only 32lumens. Couldn’t expect more from a decent price portable HD laser projector. Make sure you have a completely dark room and turn the dynamic colors on.
customer_reviews.author: An Truong

customer_reviews.title: It is GREAT product. The only thing I miss is iOS ...
customer_reviews.text: It is GREAT product. The only thing I miss is iOS compatibility!! Cables are more heavy than product and it is quite a paint to handle it - not to mention freedom of wireless!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Kunde

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: I had I hopes for this project given its a Sony. I was a bit disappointed that you have to have almost total darkness to see the picture. The auto focus is amazing and the connection options work really well. I do wish it was brighter and did better in low light.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good image quality, although the projection was kinda dim but enough for home use
customer_reviews.author: Mav

customer_reviews.title: The picture quality was excellent, but the wireless connectivity to my Apple and ...
customer_reviews.text: The picture quality was excellent, but the wireless connectivity to my Apple and Android devices didn't work. My Nexus 5x's option to cast with other devices was removed my google and you need an HDMI cable plus mini adapter to use it with my Macbook Pro.
customer_reviews.author: Drew

customer_reviews.title: Great little projector only down fall is it does not ...
customer_reviews.text: Great little projector only down fall is it does not support Playstation 3 or 4. Otherwise this would have been the perfect projector for everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: However I did not like that the product was incompatible with iOS devices
customer_reviews.text: I got the projector because of the name brand. However I did not like that the product was incompatible with iOS devices. I was searching for a chord free projector that I can use with Airplay and this projector isn't that. The projector also didn't come with a remote. The stand isn't the best. I'd rather a tripod. If you have an android I would buy this. Iphone dot bother. I'm planning on returning this project as it doesn't fit my needs. Also the lens I have on the projector has a small film that affects the video quality and I'm not sure why it's doing that.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quite an amazing projector. Compact yet versatile
customer_reviews.text: Quite an amazing projector. Compact yet versatile. Picture comes in sharp and works well overall. Keep in mind that since this is a pocket projector it works best in a dark room.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Too dim
customer_reviews.text: Great quality picture and size but had to be in near pitch dark for it to be worth looking at. Don't expect to be able to hear the speaker at all
customer_reviews.author: Andrew R

customer_reviews.title: Versatile, small and powerful
customer_reviews.text: Wow! A nice surprise that exceeded my expectations. I use it mainly for work on the road to project static and video presentations; comes handy for movie nights at home too! It is quiet and has a small size, about the size of an iPhone plus. It offers a crisp picture at different distances whether the projected screen is small or large (1 - 6+ feet diagonally). Reasonable image in bright conditions but great in the dark.
customer_reviews.author: kasm

customer_reviews.title: Great picture quality
customer_reviews.text: Everything I hoped it would be! Great picture quality, auto-focus, sound hookup through Bluetooth, etc. I don't have anything to compare it to but it's worked as I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Portable but not so high resolution images.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent portability. However, the image is not as clear as you may think. Make sure that the room is quite dark to see well. Price is reasonable. Still very nice projector. If you want something with higher resolution then I suggest buying a more expensive projector. For those tasks that do not require high resolution then this projector gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: P. Kim

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to pair with other devices - have to try ...
customer_reviews.text: Difficult to pair with other devices - have to try 3 or 4 times or more before it will work. Does not work in low light - the room has to be almost pitch dark.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazon was great its professionalism was awesome
customer_reviews.text: Amazon was great its professionalism was awesome, but my Sony projector was limited in many aspects it claim it did have,
customer_reviews.author: Tony Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great image quality! The image sized is limited by it's low brightness.
customer_reviews.author: Chris G.

customer_reviews.title: a lot of strengths, but not what expected
customer_reviews.text: great product but it is noisy and the colors are a bit dark (black) so the video quality is compromised. This would be okay for business presentations but not much use for entertainment media. It's still one of the best on the market with the range of connection options, ease of use and sharpness of image, but not what I had expected.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Blew away my expectations! Using it in a dark room provide exceptional image quality. It being super portable I can bring it with me anywhere and use screen mirroring on my Xperia Z5 or miracast with my Surface Pro 3. Use it mostly as my bedroom TV. Provides an 80" TV on my wall. Literally amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Yiu

customer_reviews.title: great projector, bluetooth doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: great if you think how small it is, u can use just in a dark place cause lumens are really low but resolution is really good, not 5 stars cause you cannot connect it bluetooth your Iphone and neither speakrs
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's a good projector if you're using it in a dark room
customer_reviews.text: It's a good projector if you're using it in a dark room. Don't expect it to have the brightness as other projectors in the market. You're buying the portability not the usability. It tends to get a lot darker when you try to adjust the horizontal / vertical lens adjustment. Bluetooth audio for some reasons has delay. Not sure anyone has the same problem. If you're watching a movie, it's horrible during the dark scene. So avoid watching Batman, cuz you won't see anything.
customer_reviews.author: R. Law

customer_reviews.title: ... spro2 projector and thought this sony projector would be better quality. Unfortunately for its price I rather have ...
customer_reviews.text: I own a zte spro2 projector and thought this sony projector would be better quality. Unfortunately for its price I rather have more features that come along with the zte. Theres no place to mount it to a tripod and the image is only sharp from closeup not from far away. The style of the projector is nice, sleek and small but would have been better to add more lumens to compete with todays pico projectors.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Sony Portable HD Mobile Projector, Bluetooth, Wi-Fi or HDMI Connectivity with Screen Size up to 120 inches (Gold)
product_meta.description: Color:GoldThe Sony MP-CL1A mobile projector is a great companion to project your favorite content from portable devices anywhere you go. Equipped with both Wi-Fi & Bluetooth technologies, and an HDMI port, this pocket-sized HD projector can connect to Android smartphones and tablets as well as your iPhone or iPad. Using Sony’s independently developed class 3R Laser Beam Scanning system under 2mw, the Sony MP-CL1A is able to deliver high contrast HD images with breathtaking color on virtually any surface at a screen size up to 120 inches. With the MP-CL1A in your pocket or bag, you have a convenient portable theatre that can display your movies, images and other data quickly and easily while on the go. Projecting images most effective in dark settings. The projector has an internal Li-ion Gel Polymer 3400mAh rechargeable battery that will also charge a mobile device. The MP-CL1A is a great mobile projecting solution. Interface- HDMI Connection(s)HDMI 1.4b/MHL 2.2 (HDCP 1.4), Screen mirroring (Miracast), Wi-Fi standards supported (indoor use only in India): IEEE 802.11 a/b/g/n (2.4 GHz/5 GHz)
feature_bullets: Pocket-sized HD Portable Projector. The average brightness is 32 lumens and equivalent brightness is 40 lumens (30% White)
Project movies, images or data from your devices, most effective in dark settings
Box includes: Projector, Lens Cover/Stand, Carrying Pouch, USB Cable
Independently developed laser beam scanning always displaying focus free content. Product is Class 3R and under 2mW.
Connect via Wi-Fi to Android smartphones and tablets or connect HDMI to iPhone or iPad (with optional Digital AV adapter and HDMI cable), computers and gaming consoles.
